gst.ui.layout

Class ComponentArrangement

  • java.lang.Object
    • gst.ui.layout.ComponentArrangement

  • public class ComponentArrangement
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that sets the preferred sizes of a Collection of Components to predefined patterns.
    EVENHEIGHTS all components have the maximum width and the same height to fill the specified area
    ONEBIG one component gets 60% of the available height, the rest fills the remaining space; all have maximum width
    params[0] is the index of "the big one"
    TWOMEDIUM two components get each 35% of avialable height, the rest fills the remaining space; all have maximum width
    params[1] is the index of first component
    params[2] is the second components index
    if both indices are the same ONEBIG size is used for the selected component
    Version:
    0.1.3 (23.07.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz
